    public class OAuth20View
extends android.webkit.WebView

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(AuthorizationRequest request,
        OAuth20ViewListener listener)
        Access to OAuth 2.0 authorization endpoint.
        Parameters:
        request - The authorization request.
        listener - A listener to receive the result of the authorization request. One of the listener's methods is called in normal cases, but none of them is not called when the authorization server did not made other response than redirects (3xx).
